config.desc:
Specifies a JSON configuration file with command line options.
Will look for 'asconfig.json' in the entry's directory if omitted.

outFile.desc:
Specifies the output file name. Emits text format if ending with .wast
(sexpr), .wat (linear) or .js (asmjs). Prints to stdout if omitted.

quiet.desc: Runs in quiet mode, not printing anything to console.

target.desc:
Specifies the target architecture:

wasm32  Compiles to 32-bit WebAssembly [default]
wasm64  Compiles to 64-bit WebAssembly

textFormat.desc:
Specifies the format to use for text output:

sexpr   Emits s-expression syntax (.wast) [default]
linear  Emits official linear syntax (.wat)
asmjs   Emits just asm.js (.js) - experimental

Text format only is emitted when used without --textFile.

textFile.desc: Can be used to save text format alongside a binary in one command.

asmjsFile.desc: Can be used to save asm.js alongside a binary in one command. - experimental

noImplicitConversion.desc: Whether to disallow implicit type conversions.

exportRuntime.desc: Runtime functions to export, defaults to 'malloc' and 'free'. [multiple]
